alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:41PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Escambia, southeastern Conecuh, Covington, Okaloosa and northeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 640 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Gantt to 3 miles south of Opp to 6 miles west of Samson to 6 miles southwest of Vernon. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestview, Niceville, Andalusia, Opp, Valparaiso, Florala, Baker, Laurel Hill and Lockhart. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland
